definition: veinstone (stone containing a vein of precious metal)
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The effect of gangue composition on reduction swelling of iron ore pellets was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脈石成分對鐵礦球團還原膨脹性能的影響。

sentences.english: Quartz is a primary gangue mineral of the gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 石英是金礦牀主要的脈石礦物。
